treehouse_title: Puede ser la Casa de Arboles Mas Fino el Todo America de Sur
sub_description: Casa del árbol entero - Anfitrión: Los Yarumos

prod_details.host: Los Yarumos tiene la categoría de Superanfitrión
prod_details.cancelation: Cancelación gratuita hasta una semana antes

prod_description: This is the kind of treehouse you see on the Discovery channel. You will experience a beautifully crafted space with fine finishing touches - this is not glamping or a cute-rustic cottage - we aimed to build something as elegant as the natural beauty that surrounds it, and we did. Equipped with a bathtub, kitchen, 2 decks, queen bed, desk, and the full feeling of being up in the trees, it's the most unique lodging experience on the outskirts of Medellin, handsdown.
during_policy: Estaremos disponibles en el caso que occure una emergencia.

cancellation.policy: Free cancelation one week before stay
